title: The Apple Watch 6 is on sale for $324.98 at Amazon - the lowest price ever
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Snag this fantastic deal on the Apple Watch 6 at Amazon today
article: If you're looking to snag a deal on Apple's latest and greatest smartwatch, then you're in luck. Right now, you can get the best-selling Apple Watch 6 on sale for $324.98 (was $399) at Amazon. That's a massive $74 discount and the lowest price we've seen for the 40mm smartwatch.

The feature-rich Apple Watch 6 tracks activity, workouts, and calories and includes a sleep app that helps you establish a regular bedtime routine to get a better night's rest. The Series 6 also comes with new health features such as blood oxygen monitoring and an ECG app that alerts you when an irregular heart rate is detected. The waterproof smartwatch still keeps you connected with the ability to take calls and reply to texts directly from your wrist. As we've mentioned above, this is the lowest price we've ever seen for the Apple Watch 6 and $25 less than last week's sale price. You'll have to hurry though, stock is moving fast, so we recommend snagging this fantastic deal now before it's too late.
